title: The New Churchill
author: VD
content_html:
Daniel Hannan rebukes Gordon Brown: “You cannot spend your way out of recession or borrow your way out of debt. And when you repeat, in that wooden and perfunctory way, that our situation is better than others, that we’re well placed to weather the storm, I have to tell you, you sound like a Brezhnev-era apparatchik giving the Party line. You know, and we know, and you know that we know that it’s nonsense!”

What in the name of King Alfred are the Tories doing wasting their time with the hapless David Cameron? This is the leader they have been looking for since the Iron Lady stepped down.
content_text:
Daniel Hannan rebukes Gordon Brown:  “You cannot spend your way out of recession or borrow your way out of debt.  And when you repeat, in that wooden and perfunctory way, that our situation is better than others, that we’re well placed to weather the storm, I have to tell you, you sound like a Brezhnev-era apparatchik giving the Party line.  You know, and we know, and you know that we know that it’s nonsense!”
What in the name of King Alfred are the Tories doing wasting their time with the hapless David Cameron?  This is the leader they have been looking for since the Iron Lady stepped down.
